title: "The Right Dungeon & the Right Dragon" - with Lou Wilson
itunes:title: "The Right Dungeon & the Right Dragon" - with Lou Wilson
description:
There's a whole lot of Blerd love in this episode. Dimension 20's Lou Wilson discusses his first time playing D&D, Improv with a guy called Brennan Lee Mulligan & how building diverse games enriches the experience.


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
